title: Activity-Based Learning Design to Address Information Systems Development (ISD) Learning Failures

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals in limited smartphone-based technological environments to enable work-integrated learning, incorporating activity-based learning and reflection to analyze ISD project failure cases and derive improvement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze learning failure factors at each stage of ISD projects and propose three or more improvement strategies
Learners can design two or more case studies applying the ISD process using activity-based learning modules in mobile environments
Learners can evaluate their own ISD practical approaches and establish improvement plans through reflective journaling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
